content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Stellar Quorum Systems
Giuliano Losa

We formalize the static properties of personal Byzantine quorum systems (PBQSs)
and Stellar quorum systems, as described in the paper ``Stellar Consensus by
Reduction'' (to appear at DISC 2019).

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Stellar_Quorums.html
smime.p7s
